message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value I can get out of the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $750,000 simply isn't enough for me.  Considering the value this product holds for you, I'm willing to come down to $875,000. This is a fair compromise, and it gives you a substantial return on your investment. Let's work together to make this happen.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $825,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
